user_query: I'm a student learning about cryptocurrencies and I need some educational resources to deepen my understanding. Can you recommend some reliable websites or online courses where I can learn about the basics of cryptocurrencies? Additionally, suggest some popular cryptocurrencies that I can track to gain practical knowledge.

TaskList.description: Search for reliable websites that provide educational resources on cryptocurrencies.
Search for online courses that cover the basics of cryptocurrencies.
Identify popular cryptocurrencies that are widely recognized and can be tracked for practical knowledge.
